page.title: 05Going to the Hospital
page.content: The General Hospital is in New Street. I am a diabetic. The nurses are very good to me. They wear light blue and dark blue dresses. The doctor I see is called Dr. Addy, he wears a long white coat. He is sometimes nice but other times he is quite horrible and he asks lots of questions. I have to have a regular check-up and sometimes a blood test. They take my blood with a needle about 4-5 cm long and the bottles are different sizes. The syringe is a 1/2 ml syringe. Sometimes they take a full syringe. Other people that have to go to hospital are old people and people that have broken a bone. Sometimes if you have broken a bone you would have to stay in hospital for a very long time.
